roles.title: Software developer
roles.description: Developed web-based management system for a variety of products in Global Relay. Mostly focus on Front-End Development (React, Redux, SenCha EXTjs), partially work on maintaining backend core services (ASP.NET, Hibernate).

roles.title: Full Stack Developer (Co-op)
roles.description: Built and updated various Chrome Extensions using TypeScript. (http://quiklogin.co/). Worked with a small team to maintain privacy-enhanced search engine applications.

roles.title: Software Developer (Co-op)
roles.description: Updated a data post-processor tool for the new generation of Wave Sensor using Microsoftâ€™s C#.NET. Worked with a small team to build a Web Portal to display data collected from numerous remote environmental monitoring platforms.
